Serve Me Well.name: Serve Me Well
Serve Me Well.flavor: You drive your thrall into battle to unleash a vicious attack.
Serve Me Well.requirement: Your thrall must be within 10 squares of you.
Serve Me Well.effect: The thrall moves its speed, then you make an attack through the thrall.
Serve Me Well.target: Each enemy adjacent to the thrall
Serve Me Well.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against the thrall until the start of your next turn.

Loosen the Chain.name: Loosen the Chain
Loosen the Chain.flavor: You loosen your hold on your thrall, letting it fight independently alongside you.
Loosen the Chain.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your thrall gains a standard action and a move action during each of your turns. You can use your standard action to give the thrall an extra action over and above its own standard action.

Restore Thrall.effect: Your thrall regains hit points equal to your healing surge value.
